scripts.dev: npm run copy-plugins && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.dev:verbose: npm run copy-plugins && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --verbose
scripts.build: npm run copy-plugins && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:production: npm run copy-plugins && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf src/.jekyll-cache src/_plugins src/_site src/.jekyll-metadata
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && shx rm -rf src/generated node_modules
